Description: White glazed steatite scarab: engraved on the base with a human-headed bearded sphinx seated on a 'nb' sign, a faint sign of a uraeus on its forehead. Above, an oval sign, perhaps the sun disc. Behind it a form of and a horizontal stroke, perhaps for 'ʿn'.
Bibliographic references: Giveon R 1985a / Egyptian scarabs from Western Asia from the collections of the British Museum (p.180, no.13)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
